name: 7H3 DUN930N
description:
You wake up in an unfamiliar dungeon. How do you get out, and why is there so much  dang math all over the place???

~10-15 min playtime; 2 Endings

7H3 DUN930N  is a math-themed puzzle game created in Bitsy for UCSC's Games and Playable Media MS course, Game Technologies. The goal was to learn the Bitsy game engine and create a short game within a week.
